name: Mahjong Match Pop
description:
The creators of the hit game, Mahjong Match Pop, present a juicy new matching puzzle game with bushels of fruity challenges!

How to Play:
-Just tap two or more Mahjong blocks of the same color.
-There is no time limit, but each stage has target points to proceed to next stage.

Rules on Scoring:
-The more blocks you pop, the more score you will get.
-Try to clear all blocks, you will get a lot of scores.

Strategic, addictive and challenging fun for everyone! Replay value is high!
Once you pop, You can't put it down! Wanna try?
